item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

8. Large language models reduce public knowledge sharing on online Q&A platforms (34 points | 13 comments)
9. Graphics Tricks from Boomers (8 points | no comments)
10. Antithesis: Pioneering Deterministic Hypervisors with FreeBSD and Bhyve (11 points | 2 comments)
11. vortex: A toolkit for working with compressed Arrow in-memory, on-disk, and over-the-wire. "The LLVM of file formats" (19 points | no comments)
12. Run Linux Containers on FreeBSD 14 with Podman (11 points | 1 comment)
13. Use an External GPU on Raspberry Pi 5 for 4K Gaming (9 points | no comments)
14. Build Systems, Not Heroes (1 points | no comments)

20. Object-Oriented Programming With ANSI-C (2 points | no comments)
21. Trust Rules Everything Around Me (WordPress, Code Security, etc.) (21 points | no comments)
22. fjall: LSM-based embeddable key-value storage engine written in safe Rust (9 points | 2 comments)
23. Bill Gross wants to save media ... with AI (1 points | 1 comment)
24. Text-overflow: Ellipsis Considered Harmful (2022) (10 points | 2 comments)
25. Ubuntu Will Include The Latest Linux Kernel Version in Future Releases (22 points | 34 comments)
